actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to eliminate the waiting periods for disability benefits and hospital insurance benefits with respect to any individual who becomes disabled as a result of a traumatic spinal cord injury.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends Title II (Old-Aged, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to eliminate the waiting periods for disability benefits and hospital insurance benefits for any individual who becomes disabled as a result of a traumatic spinal cord injury.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to eliminate the waiting periods for disability benefits and hospital insurance benefits with respect to any individual who becomes disabled as a result of a traumatic spinal cord injury.
